articles.author: Frank Landymore
articles.title: Before Apple's AI Went Haywire and Started Making Up Fake News, Its Engineers Warned of Deep Flaws With the Tech - Futurism
articles.description: Apple engineers flagged major flaws with the "reasoning" abilities of top AI models: that it's mostly a front.
articles.content:
And they released it anyway.
News Flash, Buddy
Apple's recent stab at AI, Apple Intelligence, has largely been disappointing. In particular, its news summaries faced suched widespread criticism for… [+3022 chars]
